str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From epi and timao; to tax upon, i.e. Censure or admonish; by implication, forbid.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
An evil-spirit, demon; a heathen deity. Neuter of a derivative of daimon; a d?Monic being; by extension a deity.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Perhaps from paio; a boy, or, a girl, and a child; specially, a slave or servant.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From the same as therapon; to wait upon menially, i.e. to adore, or to relieve.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
